about.title: About Tenadam Training, Consultancy & Research PLC
about.subtitle: Empowering organizations through comprehensive assessment solutions, training programs, and strategic consultancy services across Africa and the Middle East.

story.heading: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Established in 2023 through the merger of six experienced professionals, Tenadam Training, Consultancy, and Research PLC has rapidly emerged as a trusted partner for organizations seeking transformative solutions.
story.paragraph2: The name "Tenadam," meaning rue (a healing herb), symbolizes our commitment to being the remedy for business challenges. Just as rue has been used throughout history for its healing properties, we provide healing solutions for organizational challenges.
story.localImpactDesc: As a company deeply rooted in Ethiopia, we are committed to making a positive and sustainable impact on local communities while expanding our reach across Africa and the Middle East.

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.description: To assist business partners by providing practical solutions to their challenges in a value-adding manner. We aim to support our clients in achieving their goals and overcoming obstacles through our expertise in training, consultancy, and research.

vision.heading: Our Vision
vision.description: To become a notable and preferred company in training, consultancy, and research services in Africa and the Middle East by the year 2035. We envision being the go-to partner for organizations seeking excellence and transformation.

services.heading: Our Core Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions designed to drive organizational excellence and sustainable growth

platform.heading: Assessment Hub Platform
platform.description: Our cutting-edge Assessment Hub represents the convergence of our expertise in organizational development and technological innovation. Built specifically for modern organizations, it provides comprehensive assessment solutions.

whyChoose.heading: Why Choose Tenadam?
whyChoose.subtitle: Our unique approach combines local expertise with international best practices

localGlobal.title: Local Impact, Global Vision
localGlobal.description: Deeply rooted in Ethiopia with a vision to serve across Africa and the Middle East, we understand both local challenges and international best practices.

clientCentric.title: Client-Centric Approach
clientCentric.description: We place the success of our clients at the forefront of our operations, ensuring every solution is tailored to meet specific organizational needs and objectives.

expertise.title: Expertise & Experience
expertise.description: Our team comprises seasoned professionals with diverse and extensive experience in training, consultancy, and research across various industries and sectors.

contact.heading: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to transform your organization? Let's discuss how we can help you achieve your goals.
contact.startDescription: Whether you're looking to assess your organizational culture, implement the Baldrige framework, or develop your team through comprehensive training programs, we're here to help.
